juiceboxgallery.splashDescription: This is a sample splash page description. Use this text to describe the gallery to users who are viewing on an mobile device.

image.caption: This is a sample Juicebox-Pro gallery, showing some of the exclusive Pro features.

image.title: Pro Button-Bar
image.caption: The Pro Button Bar above allows for AutoPlay control, Next/Back navigation, Information button and Audio Toggle.

image.title: Watermarks
image.caption: JuiceboxBuilder-Pro allows you to easily add a watermark image into your gallery images.

image.title: Back Button
image.caption: At top-left is the optional 'Back Button'. Button text and link URL are configurable.

image.title: Easy Theming
image.caption: Configure colors and positioning via config options or create a custom theme for more advanced theming.

image.title: AutoPlay
image.caption: AutoPlay options include looping and randomization.

image.title: API
image.caption: JavaScript API allows external gallery control.

image.title: Unlimited Gallery Size
image.caption: Support for large galleries. Unlimited local images or up to 500 Flickr images.

image.title: No Branding
image.caption: Integrate Juicebox-Pro free of any branding for a full and seamless integration into your site.

image.title: Pro Customization Options
image.caption: Take advantage of over 70 additional pro customization options.

image.title: One-time Purchase
image.caption: A one-time payment with no monthly fees works out much cheaper than the equivalent hosted image gallery solution.
